languages.text: "Преподобный Иеробор писал, что "С каждого спросится по силам его, каждому воздастся по заслугам его". Мне страшно представить даже ее воздаяние".
"The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."
languages.original_text: "Преподобный Иеробор писал, что "С каждого спросится по силам его, каждому воздастся по заслугам его". Мне страшно представить даже ее воздаяние".

traits.locale_text: "The Reverend Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to his strength and rewarded according to his merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."
"The Reverend Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to his strength and rewarded according to his merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."
"The Reverend Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to his strength and rewarded according to his merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."
"The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."
"The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."

languages.text: "Der Prediger Jerobor hat geschrieben: 'Jeder erhält Aufgaben entsprechend seiner Stärke und Belohnungen entsprechend seines Nutzens.' Mir schaudert, wenn ich mir ihre Belohnung vorstelle."
languages.original_text: "The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."

traits.locale_text: "Der Reverend Jerobor hat geschrieben: 'Jeder erhält Aufgaben entsprechend seiner Stärke und Belohnungen entsprechend seines Nutzens.' Mir schaudert, wenn ich mir ihre Belohnung vorstelle."

languages.text: « Le prêcheur Jerobor a écrit : "Chacun devra contribuer à hauteur de sa force et se verra récompensé à hauteur de son mérite." Je tremble à la seule pensée de la récompense qui sera la sienne. »
languages.original_text: "The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."

traits.locale_text: « Le révérend Jerobor a écrit : "Chacun devra contribuer à hauteur de sa force et se verra récompensé à hauteur de son mérite." Je tremble à la seule pensée de la récompense qui sera la sienne. »

languages.text: «El predicador Jerobor escribió: "A cada uno se le exigirá en función de su capacidad y se le recompensará en función de su mérito". Me estremezco al pensar cuál será su recompensa».
languages.original_text: "The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."

traits.locale_text: «El reverendo Jerobor escribió: "A cada uno se le exigirá en función de su capacidad y se le recompensará en función de su mérito". Me estremezco al pensar cuál será su recompensa».

languages.text: 「伝道師のジェロボアはこう書いています。『それぞれの力に応じて求められ、その功労に応じて報われる』。彼女の報酬を想像するだけでもぞっとします」
languages.original_text: "The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."

traits.locale_text: 「ジェロボア牧師はこう書いています。『それぞれの力に応じて求められ、その功労に応じて報われる』。彼女の報酬を想像するだけでもぞっとします」

languages.text: “耶洛波布道士曾这么写道——‘每个人会按照各自的力量承受责任，按照各自的功绩得到赏赐。’我真不敢想象她会得到什么样的赏赐。”
languages.original_text: "The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."

traits.locale_text: “耶洛波牧师曾这么写道——‘每个人都会按照各自的力量得到责任，按照各自的功绩得到赏赐。’我真不敢想象她会得到什么样的赏赐。”

languages.original_text: "The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."

languages.text: "Vaiz Jerobor şöyle yazmıştı: 'Her biri, güçlü olduğu alana koşulacak ve her biri, liyakatine göre ödüllendirilecek.' Ödülünü düşünmek bile tüylerimi ürpertiyor."
languages.original_text: "The preacher Jerobor wrote, 'Each will be asked according to their strength and rewarded according to their merit.' I shudder even to imagine her reward."
